item.description: I believe having a good code repo is a necessary part of a good paper. You can find the source code for my papers and other interesting projects through my Github Apart from source code for my papers, I would like to share some of my interesting projects.

item.title: Dixi Yao
item.description: I am a Ph.D. student in iQua at the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering in the University of Toronto,advised by Baochun Li. I received my bachelor degree from Department of CSE in Shanghai Jiao Tong University.

item.title: Publications
item.description: You can learn more about my papers through Google Scholar. Privacy-preserving Machine Learning Dixi Yao, Liyao Xiang, Hengyuan Xu, Hangyu Ye, Yingqi Chen. “Privacy-Preserving Split Learning via Patch Shuffling over Transformers” in Proceedings of the 22nd IEEE International Conference on Data Mining (ICDM), Orlando, USA, November 28 - December 1, 2022.
